details.arabic_diacless: بسم اللٰه اللٰهم جنبنا الشيطان وجنب الشيطان ما رزقتنا
details.arabic: بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ اَللّٰهُمَّ جَنِّبْنَا الشَّيْطَانَ وَجَنِّبِ الشَّيْطَانَ مَا رَزَقْتَنَا
details.transliteration: Bismillaah. Allaahumma jannibnash-Shaytaana, wa jannibish-Shaytaana maa razaqtanaa.
details.translations: With the Name of Allah. O Allah, keep the Devil away from us and keep the Devil away from that which You provide for us.
